items.title: Parsnip Bites
items.descript: Sunflower seed, parsnip, sesame, and turmeric. Served with a spicy, ginger, sun dried tomato, and chili sauce

items.title: Beet Tartare
items.descript: Walnut, portobello, beet, coconut chips, cashew cream, and paprika oil.

items.title: Lettuce Wraps
items.descript: Crisp romaine leaves with a mediterranean spiced, coconut, carrot and almond filling. Topped with pickled radish and fresh green onions.

items.title: Cinnamon Apple Bread
items.descript: Served with vanilla, cashew butter, fresh apples, and apricot preserves.

items.title: Kimchi Stuffed Nori
items.descript: Marinated Chinese mushrooms, lime cream, diakon noodles, avocado, and spinach.

items.title: Moroccan Spiced Root Fritters
items.descript: Coconut and cauliflower mash, chopped kale, sweet pepper cream, and cilantro chimichurri.

items.title: Butternut and Rutabaga Spaghetti
items.descript: With a chunky tomato marinara, walnut and beet “meat” balls, fresh spinach, and cashew parmesan.

items.title: Perogies
items.descript: Pittsburgh classic. Filled with potato and cashew cheese. Pan fried with red onion and garlic. Served with a kale and cabbage slaw.

items.title: Cheesy Penne
items.descript: Brown rice penne with broccoli, red pepper and shredded carrots. Cooked in a cheddar style cashew cheese sauce.

items.title: Mushroom Noodle Bowl
items.descript: Miso and mushroom broth. Noodles made of green bean flour and thinly sliced portobello mushrooms. Topped with fresh vegetables, herbs, and side of sweet chili paste.

items.title: Cajun Stew
items.descript: Oyster mushrooms, okra, red and green peppers, collard greens, and kidney beans. Spicy tomato based sauce and brown rice. Topped with an arugula salad, green onion, and black salt.

items.title: Peanut Butter Salad
items.descript: Sweet potato, kale, red onion, spinach, broccoli, green lentils, and red cabbage. Served with a peanut butter and balsamic dressing.

items.title: garden salad
items.descript: Baby greens, kale, red pepper, cucumber, avocado, carrot, pumpkin seeds, and tomato. Served with a balsamic dressing.

items.title: Chocolate Mint Layer Cake
items.descript: Fresh mint served with a raspberry cream.

items.title: Banana Split
items.descript: With two kinds of ice cream, cherry, pistachio, cinnamon, and white chocolate. As well as chocolate fudge, candied walnuts, and vanilla whip cream.

items.title: Lime Pomegranate Pie
items.descript: Served with fresh pomegranate jewels. An entirely nut free dessert.

items.title: Double Chocolate Pecan Torte
items.descript: With local raw honey and grapefruit.
